content: Shocking! Please take your complaint further, so that others don’t have the same experience! And I’ve had a similar experience, with a (documented and approved) clip-on electric motor drive for my manual wheelchair, while overseas— fortunately the aircraft captain intervened in the discussion (on the air bridge, where they had brought it from the hold) and agreed to carry it. Otherwise, what is one to do? Abandon a $5,000 device?
